mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BORDTB(BORD_NM, BORD_CTS, BORD_STUS, USER_NM, USER_EMAIL, USER_PHONE, USER_PW, REGI_DATE, MODY_DATE) VALUES(#{braaNm}, #{braaCts},#{braaStus},#{userNm},#{userEmail},#{userPhone},#{userPw}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE())
mapper.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER () AS rowNm ,BORD_NO AS braaNo ,BORD_NM AS braaNm ,BORD_STUS AS braaStus ,BORD_CNT AS braaCnt ,USER_NM AS userNm ,DATE_FORMAT(MODY_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS modyDate FROM BORDTB WHERE 1=1
AND BORD_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{braaNm},'%')
AND USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userNm},'%')

SELECT BORD_NO AS braaNo ,BORD_NM AS braaNm ,BORD_CTS AS braaCts ,BORD_STUS AS braaStus ,USER_NM AS userNm ,USER_EMAIL AS userEmail ,USER_PHONE AS userPhone ,DATE_FORMAT(REGI_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS regiDate ,DATE_FORMAT(MODY_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS modyDate FROM BORDTB
